long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

The Simple Chrome Extensions Manager streamlines the process of managing your Chrome extensions, offering an intuitive interface for effortless control. With easy toggles and one-click actions, this extension is designed to help users efficiently manage their installed extensions without navigating through complex menus.

Key user-friendly features include:

Seamless Toggle Functionality: Quickly enable or disable extensions with a simple toggle switch, allowing users to manage their extensions on the fly without needing to open Chrome’s built-in settings.

One-Click Uninstall: Easily remove unwanted extensions with a single click, simplifying the process of decluttering your browser and enhancing performance.

Streamlined Interface: The extension features a clean and user-friendly interface that lists all installed extensions, making it easy to view, manage, and control each extension from one convenient location.

Quick Access: Launch the extension manager directly from your browser toolbar, providing immediate access to extension controls without interrupting your browsing experience.

With its straightforward and efficient design, the Simple Chrome Extensions Manager offers a hassle-free solution for managing your extensions, empowering users to take control of their browsing environment with ease.
